main event: An unidentified object was observed on ground radar, moving from West to East before disappearing.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 2-3 minutes,The object appeared as a radar blip on the ground radar,The weather conditions during the observation were clear and unlimited,The object changed colors from red to amber,The observer was H.R. Sandusky, a retired captain and chief controller pilot.
witness description: H.R. Sandusky, Capt., Ret 2.25th AD, Chief Controller (Pilot)
